text.section:
The owners of property in territory that may be served by a shared facility may file a written petition with the Sanitary Commission that requests the Sanitary Commission:
To build a shared facility; and
To designate a shared facility area.

The petition shall include:
Plans for the proposed shared facility that will enable the Sanitary Commission to determine the cost and feasibility of the proposed shared facility; and
A map of the proposed shared facility area.
The petitioners shall provide, at their own expense, the map and plans required by this section.
